text.div:
ProtocolStatus

The lifecycle status of a Protocol

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/protocol-status defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
draft Draft This protocol is still under development
testing Testing This protocol was authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing)
review Review This protocol is undergoing review to check that it is ready for production use
active Active This protocol is ready for use in production systems
withdrawn Withdrawn This protocol has been withdrawn and should no longer be used
superseded Superseded This protocol has been replaced and a different protocol should be used in its place

name: ProtocolStatus
description: The lifecycle status of a Protocol
